## Deck.(constructor)

Stores a first-in-last-out stack of cards.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(CardType: {
        new (...args: any[]): TCard;
    }, options?: IDeckOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  CardType | { new (...args: any\[\]): TCard; } | Constructor for the type of card stored in this container. Used to find the card dimensions. |
|  options | [IDeckOptions](./bge-core.ideckoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional configuration for the deck. |
